reviewText: This movie is about Myles & Tory who live and work in Atlanta. Myles buys Tory an engagement ring from a woman who happens to be the Devil's daughter. After they've been married for a short time the ring breaks and troubles begin that causes cracks in the marriage. One would think this movie would be interesting.  Well, it isn't.  I found the movie to be very boring.  One other issue I had with this movie was the sound.  Background music and sound effects were very loud.  When you adjust the volume for those the speech sounds like they are whispering.
Yes, this movie was a little confusing if you don't pay attention. You may miss important tips that would make you understand what is going on. Overall I think it is an ok movie.
If you like films that are "all over the place" and hard to follow this is the film for you. Even the actors seemed lost in this one. Silly plot, terrible lines, garbage!

Seems like a very "cheap" production. Poor sound quality.  So So acting.  Really is kind of a shame because the plot line was cute and if done right could have been a very funny movie.  As it was I had to struggle to finish it :(

This movie was such a waste of time. It was all over the place, it was a very confusing movie. I don't know Devil Diamond seem like it could've been worth something because it had a good story line but it just didn't show in the movie. This is the kind of movie that starts in the middle and goes nowhere.
